data.text:
Khepupara Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of None meters (0 feet) above sea level, Khepupara has a Tropical wet and dry or savanna climate (Classification: Aw). The district’s yearly temperature is 28.62ºC (83.52ºF) and it is 0.88% higher than Bangladesh’s averages. Khepupara typically receives about 46.67 millimeters (1.84 inches) of precipitation and has 95.02 rainy days (26.03% of the time) annually.
